channel.title: [PI] NPC drops
channel.description:
Okay I'm going to say first i already googled this and still couldnt figure it out in my PI source there are 2 NPC Drops, one is smaller in size than the other but im pretty sure the larger file is the one that changes the drops..
#dagannoth prime 2882:12 995:100 1397:1 1392:10 1399:1 6562:1 1319:1 1381:1 1385:1 1395:1 1149:1 3755:1 1201:1 1185:1 6141:1 6139:1 556:518 565:57 560:97 557:107 563:78 561:98 892:100 886:179 1439:59 1446:1 1441:58 207:2 395:5 1602:2 6739:1 6737:1 17061:1 17193:1 17215:1 17317:1 17339:1 18357:1 16909:1
what i want to do is make the 17### items rare drops, to do this would i simply break it and make it two lines like this?
#dagannoth prime 2882:12 995:100 1397:1 1392:10 1399:1 6562:1 1319:1 1381:1 1385:1 1395:1 1149:1 3755:1 1201:1 1185:1 6141:1 6139:1 556:518 565:57 560:97 557:107 563:78 561:98 892:100 886:179 1439:59 1446:1 1441:58 207:2 2364:3 395:5 1602:2 6739:1 6737:1 17061:1 17193:1 17215:1 17317:1 17339:1 18357:1 16909:1
thanks in advance!!! :D!@ what i want to do is make it so the items at the end

Okay I’m going to say first i already googled this and still couldnt figure it out
